<CMT_EN>Wording fix: "In the phrase '父上様の夢のごときではなく', the part corresponding to '게' (i.e., 'thing') is missing, which causes the Japanese sentence to feel awkward. Therefore, it has been revised to '父上様の夢のごとき「もの」ではなく'."
